page.title: 17OCCUPATIONS
page.content: Our group made a survey on how 110 people get a living.About a quarter of the people in Eagle are old age pensioners.There are 25 people who work on farms.Most of them work on poultry farms.The next most populor occupation in eagle is the distribution of goods.This includes people who have jobs in shops or salesmen.There are 14 people that are engaged with transport.There are 8 people in the Royal Air Force.There are 7 people who are employed by the County Council.There are 7 people in the building trade.In the village there are 5 office workers.there are 5 people who work for the health service.There are 5 people who work in factories.There are 3 people that work at power stations.There are 11 others. There are 17 people who give a service like hair cutting and dustmen.
